nodes.text: Frewwil was a planet located in the Frewwil system, a part of the freestanding subsectors portion of the Expansion Region. An inhospitable world, Frewwil was explored by the Republic Survey Corps scout Barosa Warren. More than fifty years later, by 2 ABY, Frewwil was controlled by the Galactic Empire and was considered to be one of the most dangerous planets under the Empire's jurisdiction.

Frewwil was first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Frewwil system, and therefore the planet Frewwil, in grid square I-14.
